p.b: Podcasting 2.0 for July 23d 2021 Episode 47: Mongo in the Congo

description.p: Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org including some GREAT on-boarding ideas for the Value 4 Value streaming payment ecosystem
I'm Adam Curry in the Heart of Hill Country Texas
And In Alabama, Our man representing at Podcast Movement - My Friend on the Other End -- Dave Jones!

item.title: Episode 28: We got the cat by the tail

description.p: Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org and welcome Paul Itoi and Evan Feenstra from Sphinx Chat to the Board meeting to discuss the Value 4 Value Podcast Payment System
And In Alabama, The only man who can chase a runaway SQL Query - My Friend on the other end - Dave Jones!
Crank those value sliders up everyone!

p.i: Support us with your Time Talent and Treasure

description.p: Adam & Dave discuss the week's developments on podcastindex.org and welcome the newly Podcasting 2.0 Certified Members!
Here's my News Slug: Apple disappoints with new Beta. Ignores 12% of podcasts with enhanced features over circling back to 2008 when Odeo coined +Follow before the platform pivoted to become twitter
Lightning labs interview Orange Pill Ryan Gentry
